author: Josh Barbanel
title: After Tax Overhaul, Manhattan Real-Estate Sales Seize Up
text:
The tax overhaul and its elimination of some tax advantages of owning property have settled like a cloud over the Manhattan real-estate market.
Buyers are becoming convinced that prices are due to fall. Sellers donâ€™t agree. The result: a standoff.
The number of contracts signed from October through January was down 6% from the same four-month...
